title: Practices
heading: Practices are applied knowledge.
content:
If purpose is the compass for the unknown, practices are the map of the known world.

DevOps is the foundation for ZenSum.

Using common practices like Continuous Integration & Delivery are essential in today's world. You cannot work agile if you need to manually test each increment.

Decoupling test specification from test implementation is in the essence of behavior-driven development.

To enter a digital world, three practices are important: automate, automate and ... automate.
